label: 没官領
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: Land rights confiscated by Kamakura from the Taira leadership and its vassals. The great majority came from vassals and were managerial offices converted after 1185 into jitō shiki. The term appears only rarely in a context apart from the Taira.↓[地頭職]
